Plot: The day-to-day lives of a number of suburban Los Angeles residents.
Title: Short Cuts
Writer: Raymond Carver (writings), Robert Altman (screenplay), Frank Barhydt (screenplay)
Actors: Andie MacDowell, Bruce Davison, Jack Lemmon, Zane Cassidy
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 17 wins & 16 nominations.
